code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import SummaryApi from'../common';import VerticalCard from'../components/VerticalCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchProduct=()=>{const query=useLocation();const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);console.log("query",query.search);const fetchProduct=async()=>{setLoading(true);const response=await fetch(SummaryApi.searchProduct.url+query.search);const dataResponse=await response.json();setLoading(false);setData(dataResponse.data);};useEffect(()=>{fetchProduct();},[query]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mx-0 p-4 md:mx-2 font-semibold",children:[loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg text-center",children:"Chargement ..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-lg font-semibold my-3",children:["Resultat : ",data.length]}),data.length===0&&!loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"bg-white text-lg text-center p-4",children:"Pas de donn\xE9es...."}),data.length!==0&&!loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VerticalCard,{loading:loading,data:data})]});};export default SearchProduct;
